tool_description:
Get complete Facebook Marketplace data to include number sold, number saved, title, description, location and category of current and past listings on FBMP. 

We are the ONLY provider of Facebook Marketplace data anywhere!
name: Facebook Marketplace
title: Facebook Marketplace

api_list.name: categories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facebook-marketplace.p.rapidapi.com/categories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facebook-marketplace.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
